s.text: A copy of the consent form was given to participants immediately following written consent.

This result is different from the work of other researchers who found that ambient temperatures significantly affected readings at various sites in infants [ 57 ] and various temperature levels in adults [ 52 ] .

Right and left readings for oral (temperature oral), axillary (temperature axilla), groin (temperature groin), and rectal (temperature rectal) were taken using sheathed oral/skin mercury-in-glass thermometers and sheathed rectal or oral/skin or rectal Galinstan-in-glass thermometers (respectively).
A true need exists to compare this mercury substitute thermometer with the mercury device.
Correlations between the two thermometer types by site were strong and statistically significant.
However, the influence of race concurs with other investigations [ 11 12 ] ; race may have a significant influence on body temperatures and needs to be studied further.
